result.short_desc: 6 in. grooved galvanized ductile iron rigid coupling style 005 005 6 galv coup
result.long_desc: firelock style 005 rigid coupling has a unique patented angle pad design which allows the housings to offset while clamping the grooves. by permitting the housings to slide on the angled bolt pads rigidity is obtained. support and hanging requirements correspond to nfpa 13 sprinkler systems. angle pad design permits assembly by removing one nut/bolt and swinging the housing over the gasket. this reduces components to handle during assembly. the vic plus system patented is dry clean and non toxic. it reduces assembly time substantially and eliminates the mess and chance of over lubrication.
